title: Sound Opinions Evergreen Episode 2014
teaser: This is an Evergreen episode of Sound Opinions that can air at any time during the year.
description:
FEATURE SEGMENT 1:
Hosts Jim DeRogatis and Greg Kot talk to Scott and Dean Blackwood, the men behind an impressive new box set, “The Rise and Fall of Paramount Records 1917-1927, Volume 1.” The collection was co-produced by Jack White’s Third Man Records and contains 800 songs by over 150 artists from the historic label housed in a Wisconsin chair company. 
FEATURE SEGMENT 2:
Hosts Jim DeRogatis and Greg Kot name the best Instrumental songs in rock and roll. Some songs deliver the most powerful messages without any words at all.  Some of their favorites are by Dick Dale, Duane Eddy and DJ Money Mark.
YOUR SOUND OPINIONS:
At the end of the show we hear comments from listeners.
